page.title: 17FENCE'S PLAYBUS
page.content: THE PLAY BUS COMES EVERY FRIDAY MORNING FROM 9.00 TILL 11.29.FOR CHILDREN AGED 2_5 IT'S FREE.THEY GET ABOUT 15 CHILDREN COMING ON EVERY WEEK IN HIGHAM. THE PLAY BUS HAS BEEN COMING FOR 7 YEARS.ON THE BUS THERE ARE 4 TEACHERS.THERE ARE SAND PITS,SLIDES,JIGSAWS,BRICKS AND PAINTING.THE BUS HAS BEEN PAINTED ON THE OUTSIDE. DOWN STAIRS CONTAINS STICKEL BRICKS,LEGO,BOOKS,SAND AND TOY CARS. UP STAIRS THEIR'S A NUMBER OF THINGS LIKE A SLIDE,CARS TO RIDE ON AND A WASHING MACHINE.IF THERE IS A FIRE THERE IS A HATCH FROM THE UP STAIRS TO THE DOWN STAIRS FOR QUICK SAFE EXIT.
